name: skrypt.sh
description: template of sbatch script for mumax3
specification:
#!/bin/bash
#SBATCH -J
#SBATCH --time=1:00:00
#SBATCH --gres=gpu:1
#SBATCH -A grant010gpu
#SBATCH -p plgrid-gpu
#SBATCH --output="_output.txt"
#SBATCH --error="_error.txt"
date
module add plgrid/apps/mumax/3.9.3
mumax3
date
